action.action-desc: Mr. Bost (for himself, Mr. Issa, Mrs. Radewagen, Mr. Bergman, Mr. Moore of Alabama, Mr. Cawthorn, Ms. Mace, Mr. Ellzey, Ms. Conway, and Mrs. Harshbarger) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Honoring our PACT Act of 2022 to establish a maximum amount of attorney fees for suits against the United States relating to water at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Camp Lejeune Veterans and Families Protection Act.

section.header: Maximum amount of attorney fees for suits against the United States relating to water at Camp Lejeune, North Carolina
section.text: Section 804 of the Honoring our PACT Act of 2022 (Public Law 117â€“168; 28 U.S.C. 2671 note) is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: The limit on fees and the penalties under section 2678 of title 28, United States Code, shall apply with respect to actions under this section.
